divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: The sighting occurred on Sunday, March 13, 2005. The time of the event was somewhere between 11am and 1pm, respectfully. As I drove up the Watterson Expressway on-ramp located next to the Mall St. Matthews heading towards the interchange with Interstate 64 (westerly direction), I noticed a small black object in sky over Interstate 64 from that distance (at least 3-4 football fields away). At first I thought it was one of those ballons car dealerships hang above their lots to get your attention. As I went under I64 I became afraid when I saw that the object was a perfectly circular and flat. Black on the bottom and reflective metal-like surface on the top. It stayed in the same position for quit sometime. I pulled off the shoulder and watched it for at least another 5 minutes before it went out of view. I called the police and local tv stations, but no one reported anything to anyone as far as I can tell. I am considering checking with the local airport to see if they recorded anything unknown on their radar.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around March 15th 2005
